import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Footer = () => (

Quick Links

  • Home
  • Shop
  • Appointment
  • Contact

Social Media

  • Instagram
  • Facebook
  • WhatsApp

Newsletter

Business Info

123 Vision St.

City, State, ZIP

Phone: (123) 456-7890

Email: info@clearview.com

); export default Footer;
